overview: Our team is faced with an extraordinary murder. Ayla Saritas was killed by having her heart ripped out. Right after the incident, Ayla's sister, Canan, comes and confesses that she committed the murder herself. So is the murderer really Canan? While the suspects emerging around a passionate love are dragged in a whirlpool of betrayal and jealousy, as the investigation deepens, it is revealed that everyone has a reckoning with Ayla. Our team, following the evidence, finds themselves in a maze of emotions, intertwined with each other. The exit from this labyrinth will not be easy.
title: Circle: Heartless
